title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (deno)
summary: Lightweight Deno CLI for chatting with Ollama models from terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that proxies to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed REST bindings to Ollama API.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Community curated GGUF conversions of GPT4All models loadable via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat over documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Node-API native add-on for high-performance bindings to llama.cpp via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for reproducible LLM pipelines in CI.
